oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notice of Abolition of Slavery in Alabama
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Official proclamation of the abolition of slavery in Alabama as decreed by the Convention of Alabama after the Civil War.

A list of ordinances passed by the provisional government in Alabama at the conclusion of the Civil War was sent to Tennessee Governor William Brownlow by Alabama's provisional governor Lewis E. Parsons in October 1865.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alabama. Department of Executive
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Reconstruction (1865-1876); Slavery
Proclamations; Slavery
